title: Getting Started
description:
Mobile is an opinionated CLI for generating React Native Expo projects. We do so by adopting a development style guide which enforces strong typing with TypeScript, standardized Component, Layout and Screen models,
and a data-layer design promoting unified consumption through React Contexts and Services.
Follow the installation guide below to set up the Stripe CLI.

title: Features
description: This section will provide a brief introduction to generating features inside a project. Each available feature has a dedicated section in our documentation.
